sentences.sentence: Whether from jealousy or fear of someone who looked so different, my older brothers sometimes teased me about my unpleasing skin, or made fun of my clumsy walk.
sentences.translation: 我的哥哥们，不知道对长相与众不同的人是出于嫉妒，还是出于害怕，时常会取笑我那看上去令人不适的皮肤，或我那笨拙的步伐。

sentences.sentence: There is much which will be unpleasing to the English reader.
sentences.translation: 有很多东西将会使英国读者不愉快。

sentences.sentence: Don't engage in a personal cover-up of areas that are unpleasing in your life.
sentences.translation: 不要人为地去掩饰生活中的不尽人意之处。
